description:
The Mega Trail Mix Fleece Crew is the perfect shirt for your next cabin weekend or big hike. The bluesign®-approved 100% polyester fabric is quick-drying and breathable, with UPF 30 sun protection. The double-layer hem and cuffs add a layer of warmth, and the wicking fabric will keep you comfortable all day.

An all-purpose, do-it-all layer for your outdoor pursuits, the Mega Trail Mix Fleece Crew provides casual warmth and comfort.
name: Outdoor Research Mega Trail Mix Fleece Crew - Mens
